p: Fire ant bait AIs are dominated by synthetic insecticides. Among eight AIs ( Table 1), six are synthetic insecticides. The search for synthetic bait AIs has continued. Two synthetic neonicotinoids, sulfoxaflor and triflumezopyrim, and one synthetic pyrethroid, cypemethrin, have been evaluated as fire ant bait AIs [ 12, 13, 14]. Although all these three insecticides showed promising effect, no bait products based on these insecticides are available in the current US market.
